Reason: The 'downScalingAlgorithm' configuration is performance-sensitive because the choice of scaling algorithm directly impacts the performance of image processing operations in the system. Therefore, the 'downScalingAlgorithm' configuration is considered performance-sensitive based on its direct and substantial impact on system performance.
